summary: Provides a transformation pass that recursively decomposes any gate acting on three or more qubits into a sequence of one‑ and two‑qubit operations, converting the circuit to a DAG, handling control‑flow constructs, and raising errors when a decomposition is unavailable.
business_intent: Allows quantum circuits to be compiled for back‑ends that only support up to two‑qubit gates by automatically breaking down larger multi‑qubit operations into hardware‑compatible primitives.
